SELECT U.IDX AS userIdx, U.ID AS id, U.EMAIL AS email, U.NAME AS name, U.TEL AS tel, U.POINT AS point, U.GENDER AS gender, U.NICKNAME AS nickname, DATE_FORMAT(U.BIRTH_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthDate, U.ZIP_CODE AS zipCode, U.ADDRESS AS address, U.ADDRESS_DETAIL AS addressDetail, U.USER_TYPE_IDX AS userType, U.STATUS AS status, DATE_FORMAT(U.CREATED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdAt, U.LOCKED AS locked, U.LOCK_COUNT AS lockCount, DATE_FORMAT(U.LOCKED_AT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS lockedAt,
S.SHELTER_NAME AS shelterName, S.SHELTER_TEL AS shelterTel, S.SHELTER_PERSON_NAME AS shelterPersonName, S.SHELTER_EMAIL AS shelterEmail, S.SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER AS shelterBusinessNumber, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS AS shelterAddress, S.SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL AS shelterAddressDetail, S.SHELTER_DESCRIPTION AS shelterDescription FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN SHELTERS S ON U.IDX = S.USER_IDX WHERE U.IDX = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, NAME = #{name}, TEL = #{tel}, GENDER = #{gender}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{addressDetail}, POINT = #{point}, STATUS = #{status} WHERE IDX = #{userIdx}

UPDATE SHELTERS SET SHELTER_TEL = #{shelterTel}, SHELTER_NAME = #{shelterName}, SHELTER_PERSON_NAME = #{shelterPersonName}, SHELTER_EMAIL = #{shelterEmail}, SHELTER_BUSINESS_NUMBER = #{shelterBusinessNumber}, SHELTER_ADDRESS = #{shelterAddress}, SHELTER_ADDRESS_DETAIL = #{shelterAddressDetail}, SHELTER_DESCRIPTION = #{shelterDescription} WHERE IDX = #{userIdx}
